reviews.name: Harshit V Gandhi
reviews.text: Mushroom Masala was too good! Cannot imagine home cooked food at this rate in 2026.

reviews.name: REJITH R J
reviews.text: Delicious home-style food at very economical rates. Prepared with healthy ingredients, generous portion size, and excellent quality. Freshly made for home delivery with customised preparation as per request. Highly recommended üëç

reviews.name: Sunanda Goswami
reviews.text: You can literally taste the love in this food. Simple, soulful, and so satisfying. Truly home-style cooking made with a lot of love ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.name: Neil .M. Oliver
reviews.text: So fresh, so flavorful, and so lovingly prepared. You can tell a lot of effort and passion goes into the cooking. Loved every bite!

reviews.name: Sushmita goswami
reviews.text: The food didn‚Äôt just fill my stomach, it filled my heart. Simple, delicious, and made with so much love. Would happily eat this again and again. This is the kind of food that makes you smile while eating. Pure comfort, beautiful taste, and made with so much love. Truly special.üíñüíñüíñ

reviews.name: aneesh denny
reviews.text: Affordable home-cooked food with good quality and quantity. The non-veg items are especially good and feel fresh and homely.

reviews.name: suraj janjwadia
reviews.text: The food was delicious, comforting, and full of warmth. You can tell it‚Äôs made with quality ingredients and a lot of love. Nothing felt rushed or artificial‚Äîjust honest, homely, and satisfying food. It reminded me of meals cooked with care, where taste and emotion go hand in hand.

reviews.name: Vinod Kumar
reviews.text: Order a veg biryani and mashroom mashala taste is very very good

reviews.name: Anubhav Chauhan
reviews.text: Loved their food. It was really delicious and healthy.

reviews.name: Pratik Kharat
reviews.text: Ordered the Chicken Biryani, Shami Kabab, and Green Pahadi Chicken from HealthyMealSpot and was thoroughly impressed. The food is high quality, healthy, and incredibly reasonably priced. It‚Äôs hard to find good Pahadi Chicken and authentic Shami Kababs at these rates. Definitely my new go-to for a guilt-free meal!
